name: A Deal with the Devil
description:
Fight off cane throwing business men, and sell your soul to the devil to become more and more powerful.

Made in 48h for Ludum Dare 44

I've had issues with stuttering to comment if you have them too, I wan't to know how widespread this issue is.

Instructions are in game, but I'll repeat them here:

WASD to move

Left Click to shoot

Right Click to dash towards your mouse once you have it

You use hearts to buy new ugrades. Each time you complete a level, you gain the amount of hearts that you had left over. Go to the shop to sell them to the devil. If you're stuck on a level, try replaying an older one to get hearts and new upgrades.
